rooms.description: Open-plan living area that combines seating and dining areas with the kitchen space.
Open-plan kitchen integrated within the living area, designed for efficient workflow and accessibility.
First bedroom located on the ground floor with en-suite bathroom to ensure privacy and accessibility.
Second bedroom with built-in storage and space for a private gym within an adjoining multipurpose room.
Bathroom attached to bedroom1, designed with accessibility features.
A dedicated gym space integrated within the apartment for personal exercise routines, featuring flexible equipment placement and ample space.
Additional storage area within the kitchen zone, designed for easy access and organization.
Main circulation space connecting all rooms on the ground floor, designed with wide passages for wheelchair accessibility.

openings.description: Main entrance that adheres to Vastu principles by being positioned on the north side, ensuring positive energy flow.

openings.location: Adjacent to living area and central courtyard
openings.description: Window opening that provides natural light into the open-plan areas, enhancing connectivity with the central courtyard.

courtyard.description: A central courtyard providing natural light and ventilation, acting as a communal space with garden elements.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom on the upper floor, designed with a private balcony for extra space and fresh air.
Second additional bedroom with ample natural light, ideal for quiet relaxation or as a guest room.
Bathroom attached to bedroom3, designed with accessibility features and privacy.
Shared bathroom on the upper floor for use by the additional bedrooms.
Main circulation space on the upper floor, with wide passages to ensure wheelchair accessibility and connectivity between rooms.
